html: I won’t stop until we repeal ObamaCare and find affordable, patient-centered healthcare solutions for all Americans. You have my word.
text: I won’t stop until we repeal ObamaCare and find affordable, patient-centered healthcare solutions for all Americans. You have my word.

html: My commitment to you remains the same, however. We MUST continue to work for those who have been negatively impacted by ObamaCare.
text: My commitment to you remains the same, however. We MUST continue to work for those who have been negatively impacted by ObamaCare.

html: And to say I’m disappointed that my colleagues in the Senate chose this unsustainable status quo would be an understatement.
text: And to say I’m disappointed that my colleagues in the Senate chose this unsustainable status quo would be an understatement.

html: Unfortunately, all three of those votes failed.
text: Unfortunately, all three of those votes failed.

html: Over the last few days, I’ve voted three times to repeal ObamaCare, just like I promised you.
text: Over the last few days, I’ve voted three times to repeal ObamaCare, just like I promised you.

html: We can’t give up.
text: We can’t give up.

html: In the days ahead, as the Senate moves forward and considers various options, I will continue to make your voice heard in Washington.
text: In the days ahead, as the Senate moves forward and considers various options, I will continue to make your voice heard in Washington.

html: That’s why I voted to begin debate on repealing this disastrous law and replacing it with solutions that are patient-centered.
text: That’s why I voted to begin debate on repealing this disastrous law and replacing it with solutions that are patient-centered.

html: For far too long, I’ve heard from folks about the struggles everyday Americans face under ObamaCare.
text: For far too long, I’ve heard from folks about the struggles everyday Americans face under ObamaCare.
